body.header: Questions 7-11. The reading passage describes a number of cause and effect relationships. Match each cause (Questions 7-11) with its effect (A-H). Write the appropriate letters A-H. There are more effects than causes, so you will not use them all.

section.ol: 7the position of Jupiter in the Solar System 8the size of the moon 9the formation of limestone 10the distance of the Earth from the Sun 11the Earth's position in the Galaxy

section.p: This exercise refers to the second half of the text, where the author explains the reasons why complex life has managed to evolve on Earth.

The causes listed here are, in most cases, worded exactly as they are in the text. Scan for these and when you find one read carefully around it. You might want to read through and see if you can guess which causes and effects match before checking in the text.
